title: Second time: What do the approximately one inch green disks mean when they are applied sometimes once sometimes twice to lampposts, trees and/or posts in certain areas of the town (certainly in the Forest Hills and Metts Avenue areas).
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/08/what-are-the-green-disks-on-utility-poles/
